mapper.insert: insert into user_table (user_idx, user_name, user_id, user_pw, user_tel, user_address) values (user_seq.nextval, #{user_name}, #{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_tel}, #{user_address})
mapper.select: select * from user_table natural join COMPANY_TABLE where user_info ='T'

select * from (select T1.*, rownum rnum from (select u.user_idx, u.user_name, u.user_pw, u.user_tel, u.therapist_license, u.therapist_picture, u.therapist_career, u.therapist_level, u.therapist_resume, c.company_local from user_table u, company_table c where c.company_id = u.company_id and u.user_info ='T') T1) where rnum between ((#{page}-1) * #{perPage} + 1) and (#{page} * #{perPage})
select count(*) from user_table where user_info = 'T'
